issue.title: typo in 27.4.4.2, p17: copy_event does not exist

blockquote.p: -17- Before copying any parts of rhs, calls each registered callback pair (fn,index) as (*fn)(erase_event,*this,index). After all parts but exceptions() have been replaced, calls each callback pair that was copied from rhs as (*fn)(copy_event,*this,index).

discussion.p: The name copy_event isn't defined anywhere. The intended name was copyfmt_event.

resolution.p: Replace copy_event with copyfmt_event in the named paragraph.
